title: The Enemy Within
description: This gritty but thrilling story follows on from the previous B-Squad books, A Brave New Squad and In Each Other We Trust, giving the reader futher insight into the people that dedicate their lives to The B-Squad. This can be read as the third in the series or as a book on its own. This sassy and clever thriller has everything from sex to suspense and guns to glory. This book will entertain and inform. It will excite both your body and your mind.
author: Connor Fitzgerald
